SELECT
m_article.id as id, m_article.title as title, m_article.description as description, m_article.publish_flg as publishFlg, m_article.recommend_flg as recommendFlg, R_COMIC.red_flg as redFlg, R_COMIC.translate_flg as translateFlg, m_user.id as "userBean.id", m_user.nickname as "userBean.nickname", m_user.signature as "userBean.signature",
FROM R_COMIC left join m_article on R_COMIC.id = m_article.id left join m_user on m_user.id = m_article.user_id
m_article.id = #{id} AND m_article.del_flg = '0'
